name: Foofle Docs
description: Foofle Docs Is A Game That I Made In Construct 3.  It Is A Writing Software Type Game That Is Inspired By Google Docs.  You Can Play Around And Move Around With The Foofle Docs Logo With The Arrow Keys.  You Can Also Use The Options Menu In The Game For Other Cool Things.  When You Get To The End Of Writing A Line Make Sure To Click Into The Line Below It To Make It Look Like A Properly Formatted Document.  It Is Fun.
